Automatically generated text descriptions are editable by the :term[content] creator.

:::ednote
* Method: Update an automatically generated text description.
* Method: Update an image with an automatically generated text description to mark it as decorative.
* Recommend moving to method and updating the management sheet to removed?
  * Move to method for "Equivalent text alternatives"?
:::

:::tests
<b>Procedure</b>
For each image that has automatically generated text descriptions, check that:
* the image's text description can be updated; and
* the image can be marked as decorative.

<b>Expected results</b>
* #1a is true. 
* #1b is true,.
:::
